languages.text: {n}Тервантьяс суетливо передвигается по лаборатории, перекладывая с места на место инструменты, склянки и записи. Одни вещи осторожно прячутся в полости прямо в теле гемункула, другие — уничтожаются на месте.{/n}
{n}Tervantias rushes about the laboratory, snatching up certain tools, vials, and notes. He conceals some of these items inside his own body cavities and destroys the rest.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Тервантьяс суетливо передвигается по лаборатории, перекладывая с места на место инструменты, склянки и записи. Одни вещи осторожно прячутся в полости прямо в теле гемункула, другие — уничтожаются на месте.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Tervantias is hurriedly moving about the laboratory, grabbing certain tools, vials, and notes, concealing some of these items inside the cavities in his own body, and destroying the rest.{/n}
{n}Tervantias is hurriedly moving about the laboratory, grabbing certain tools, vials, and notes, concealing some of these items inside the cavities in his own body, and destroying the rest.{/n}
{n}Tervantias rushes about the laboratory, snatching up certain tools, vials, and notes. He conceals some of these items inside his own body cavities then destroys the rest.{/n}

{n}Tervantias rushes about the laboratory, snatching up certain tools, vials, and notes. He conceals some of these items inside his own body cavities and destroys the rest.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Tervantias s'active dans son laboratoire, s'emparant d'outils, de flacons et de ses notes. Il dissimule une partie de ces objets dans ses cavités corporelles et entreprend de détruire le reste.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Tervantias rushes about the laboratory, snatching up certain tools, vials, and notes. He conceals some of these items inside his own body cavities and destroys the rest.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Tervantias s'active dans son laboratoire, s'emparant d'outils, de flacons et de ses notes. Il dissimule une partie de ces objets dans ses cavités corporelles et entreprend de détruire le reste.{/n}

languages.text: {n}特万提亚斯在实验室里急匆匆地跑来跑去，收拾着工具、药瓶和笔记。他把其中一部分实验材料藏在了自己的体腔里，把剩下的东西都销毁了。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Tervantias rushes about the laboratory, snatching up certain tools, vials, and notes. He conceals some of these items inside his own body cavities and destroys the rest.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}特万提亚斯在实验室里急匆匆地跑来跑去，收拾着工具、药瓶和笔记。他把其中一部分实验材料藏在了自己的体腔里，把剩下的东西都销毁了。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Tervantias eilt durch das Laboratorium und greift sich schnell bestimmte Werkzeuge, Phiolen und Notizen. Einige dieser Gegenstände versteckt er in seinen eigenen Körperöffnungen, dann zerstört er den Rest.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Tervantias rushes about the laboratory, snatching up certain tools, vials, and notes. He conceals some of these items inside his own body cavities and destroys the rest.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Tervantias eilt durch das Laboratorium und greift sich schnell bestimmte Werkzeuge, Phiolen und Notizen. Einige dieser Gegenstände versteckt er in seinen eigenen Körperöffnungen, dann zerstört er den Rest.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Tervantias corre de un lado a otro del laboratorio, recogiendo herramientas, frascos y notas. Guarda algunos de estos objetos dentro de sus cavidades corporales y destruye el resto.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Tervantias rushes about the laboratory, snatching up certain tools, vials, and notes. He conceals some of these items inside his own body cavities and destroys the rest.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Tervantias corre de un lado a otro del laboratorio, recogiendo herramientas, frascos y notas. Guarda algunos de estos objetos dentro de sus cavidades corporales y destruye el resto.{/n}

languages.text: {n}テルヴァンティアスは研究室を駆け回り、特定の道具や小瓶、メモをひったくる。彼はこれらのアイテムのいくつかを自分の体腔内に隠し、残りを破壊する。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Tervantias rushes about the laboratory, snatching up certain tools, vials, and notes. He conceals some of these items inside his own body cavities and destroys the rest.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}テルヴァンティアスは研究室を駆け回り、特定の道具や小瓶、メモをひったくる。彼はこれらのアイテムのいくつかを自分の体腔内に隠し、残りを破壊する。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Tervantias laboratuvarda koşuşturuyor, belli gereçleri, şişeleri ve notları topluyor. Bunların bazılarını kendi bedenindeki oyuklara gizliyor, geri kalanını ise yok ediyor.{/n}
